EmailTemplate.subject: YessToCode Salesforce Administrator
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to YessToCode
Hello,
{!Lead.Name}
Congratulations on your first step toward your career as Salesforce Administrator.
Salesforce Administrator is one of the most demanding profiles in the IT industry. Our Salesforce Administrator program gives immense exposure to the IT industry working. This program is a wholesome pack of:
Live classes Experienced and Dynamic tutors Introduction to the industry norms Practical assignments One live project Q&A session
What Happens Next?
Our Executive will contact you and provide you with details of Salesforce Administrator course
Any questions?
CONTACT US DIRECTLY →
